name: Criminal Detectives - Investigate the Criminal Case
name_original: Criminal Detectives - Investigate the Criminal Case
description:
AN ALL-NEW HIDDEN OBJECT GAME
Join the Special Forces in Miami, and dive into a whole new world of fresh hidden object puzzles, brutal crimes and exciting criminal scenes. Use your keen eye and quick wit to solve a new crime every 2 weeks.
Play through beautiful scenes and challenging puzzles in every episode.
Enjoy exciting hidden object action, including timed matching, spot the difference, and even match the puzzle!
Have you got what it takes to catch the criminals in Miami and solve the brutal cases?

FEATURES:
• Investigate crime scenes.
• 10 Crime scenes to solve.
• Bring the killers to justice.
• Boosters to help you out during your investigation.
• Stunning artwork.
• Facebook Cloud Save.
• Facebook login.
• Invite your friends.
• Share your progress on Facebook.

PLEASE NOTE – Criminal Detective - Murder Case is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
